reporter_caption.center: EMALER REALTY CO., INC. v. TUDOR CITY FOURTH UNIT, 255 App. Div. 833 (1938)

caption.center: EMALER REALTY COMPANY, INC., Respondent, v. TUDOR CITY FOURTH UNIT, INC.,
and FRED F. FRENCH MANAGEMENT COMPANY, INC., Appellants.

court.center: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York, First Department.

opinion.opinion_text: Order unanimously affirmed, with twenty dollars costs and disbursements. This case could be disposed of without the necessity of a trial by the execution of a written agreement which would safeguard plaintiff's rights against any possible easement.
opinion.panel: Present â€” Martin, P.J., O'Malley, Townley, Glennon and Dore, JJ.
